reviewtext: After using a Handspring, but going through batteries too quickly, I decided to upgrade to this timeless PDA. I have no complaints with it other than the serial sync is a lot slower than the USB sync. I love the built-in battery, metal case, and slim size. I fit this in my pocket and it is a lot lighter than my wallet ;) Now that the m500 discounts have hit, the Vx is coming down to very attractive prices....
